A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If all the racists\,  misogynists and Jar Jar Binks fans left their prejudice outside\, and actually watched the movie\, I'm sure they'll agree it was great. I watched in in 3D on Monday\, and in 5 minutes I'm off to see it in 2D. Great addition to the Star Wars series\, and Much Much Much better than 1\,2\, and 3. Mind you\, it would be difficult to be worse\, wouldn't it?
